text: The FPS Chancellery of the Prime Minister (, , ) is a Federal Public Service in Belgium. It is comparable to the Chancellery of the Federal Chancellor of Germany. It was created as the FPS Chancellery and General Services by Royal Order on May 15, 2001, as part of the plans of the Verhofstadt I Government to modernise the federal administration. Its name was changed by Royal Order on September 4, 2002. The Chancellery of the Prime Minister is responsible for assisting the Prime Minister with leading and coordinating the government policy. ==External links== * Website of the Chancellery of the Prime Minister * Website of the Prime Minister of Belgium Chancellery Category:Ministries established in 2001 Category:2001 establishments in Belgium
title: Federal Public Service Chancellery of the Prime Minister
